name: Anamitra

projects.title: Project One Test
projects.description: This application allows users to log in with their GitHub account and create a repository with a sample file using the application. It uses GitHub OAuth for authentication and JSON Web Token (JWT) for request authentication. It requires 'public profile', 'repo', and 'workflow' permission from the user. PostgresDB/SQLite for user data storage.
